scale-unlimited/declaration-strict-value.message: ❌ ACCESSIBILITY: Use CSS variables for colors (e.g., var(--color-text-muted)). Hardcoded hex values may fail WCAG contrast requirements.

color-no-hex.message: ❌ ACCESSIBILITY: Hex colors are not allowed. Use CSS variables: --color-text, --color-text-muted, --color-text-subtle, --color-link, etc.

color-named.message: ❌ ACCESSIBILITY: Named colors are not allowed. Use CSS variables for consistent, accessible colors.
